General.Name: DFS Furniture plc
General.Description: DFS Furniture plc designs, manufactures, sells, delivers, installs, and retails upholstered furniture in the United Kingdom and Europe. The company retails sofas under the DFS and Sofology brands. It also engages in the contract logistics business. It operates a network of 118 DFS showrooms and 55 Sofology stores. The company also sells its products through websites. DFS Furniture plc was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Doncaster, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Rockingham Way, Doncaster, United Kingdom, DN6 7NA

5.Name: Mr. Alex  Salden
